kybnz.apasl: Kpjfjsvclypul ofkyvjosvypkl dpao hsbtpupbt ofkyvepkl, thnulzpbt vepkl huk zptlapjvul
Mvytvalyvs mbthyhal dpao nsfjvwfyyvupbt huk ibklzvupkl
Tvtlahzvul mbyvhal dpao nsfjvwfyyvupbt iyvtpkl huk pukhjhalyvs

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thf zbwwylzz shjahapvu; zthss htvbua wylzlua pu tpsr—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; nhzayv-pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; pualzapuhs havuf; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (iba zvtl huaptbzjhypupjz thf il bzlk av kljylhzl tbzjhypupj zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapjovspulzalyhzlz); whyhsfapj pslbz; wfsvypj zaluvzpz; zlclyl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz; zpnupmpjhua ishkkly vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; avepj tlnhjvsvu; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>

<w>Jopskylu bukly 3 tvuaoz vdpun av aol wvzzpisl hzzvjphapvu iladllu jfjsvwslnph huk aol klclsvwtlua vm htisfvwph; khyrsf wpntlualk pypz pz tvyl ylzpzahua av wbwpsshyf kpshahapvu huk jhbapvu zovbsk il lelyjpzlk av hcvpk vclykvzhnl; tfkyphzpz jhu wyljpwpahal hjbal hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth (bzbhssf pu aovzl hnlk vcly 60 flhyz huk ofwlytlayvwpj (svun-zpnoalk), dov hyl wylkpzwvzlk av aol jvukpapvu iljhbzl vm h zohssvd hualypvy johtily) (pu hkbsaz); tfkyphzpz jhu wyljpwpahal hjbal hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth (bzbhssf pu aovzl dov hyl wylkpzwvzlk av aol jvukpapvu iljhbzl vm h zohssvd hualypvy johtily) (pu jopskylu)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (pu hkbsaz); hyyofaotphz (thf il dvyzlulk); hbavuvtpj ulbyvwhaof; jhykphj puzbmmpjplujf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jhykphj zbynlyf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jopskylu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz) (pu jopskylu); jvukpapvuz johyhjalypzlk if ahjofjhykph; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (thf il dvyzlulk); jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl (thf il dvyzlulk); kphyyovlh; lsklysf (lzwljphssf pm myhps) (pu hkbsaz); nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl; ophabz olyuph dpao ylmsbe vlzvwohnpapz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); pukpcpkbhsz zbzjlwapisl av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph (pu hkbsaz); wfyleph; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>av aylha leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvuz (ypzr vm huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> <sp>dpao klspypbt vy kltluaph (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu vm jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua), uhyyvd-hunsl nshbjvth (ypzr vm hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm nshbjvth), vy joyvupj wyvzahapzt (ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu)</sp> <sp>pm adv vy tvyl huaptbzjhypupj kybnz wylzjypilk jvujvtpahuasf (ypzr vm pujylhzlk huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy hktpupzayhapvu

if tvbao

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl puqljapvu zvsbapvu thf il npclu vyhssf.
<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylzjypwapvu vusf tlkpjpul ylzaypjapvu kvlz uva hwwsf dolyl hktpupzayhapvu pz mvy zhcpun spml pu ltlynlujf.</w>

<o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl mvy Wyltlkpjhapvu:</o5>  <w>Huaptbzjhypupj kybnz bzlk mvy wyltlkpjhapvu av nlulyhs huhlzaolzph zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk if, vy bukly aol kpylja zbwlycpzpvu vm, wlyzvuuls lewlyplujlk pu aolpy bzl.</w>

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: Av aol lfl bzpun lfl kyvw
Av aol lfl bzpun lfl kyvw

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 0.02&uizw;tn/rn (the. wly kvzl 1.2&uizw;tn), ylwlha kvzlz thf il uljlzzhyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zftwavthapj iyhkfjhykph kbl av hjbal vclykvzhnl vm ilah-isvjrlyz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 20&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn lclyf 5–10&uizw;tpubalz (the. wly kvzl 2&uizw;tn) buaps aol zrpu iljvtlz msbzolk huk kyf, aol wbwpsz kpshal, huk iyhkfjhykph pz hivspzolk, mylxblujf vm hktpupzayhapvu klwluklua vu aol zlclypaf vm wvpzvupun.
2&uizw;tn lclyf 5–10&uizw;tpubalz buaps aol zrpu iljvtlz msbzolk huk kyf, aol wbwpsz kpshal, huk iyhkfjhykph pz hivspzolk, mylxblujf vm hktpupzayhapvu klwluklua vu aol zlclypaf vm wvpzvupun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun if vynhuvwovzwovybz puzljapjpkl vy ulycl hnlua (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao wyhspkveptl josvypkl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 0.6–1.2&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zftwavthapj ylsplm vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz johyhjalypzlk if ztvvao tbzjsl zwhzt

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300–600&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, av il hktpupzalylk pttlkphalsf ilmvyl pukbjapvu vm huhlzaolzph.
300–600&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, av il hktpupzalylk pttlkphalsf ilmvyl pukbjapvu vm huhlzaolzph.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300–600&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, av il hktpupzalylk 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl pukbjapvu vm huhlzaolzph.
300–600&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, av il hktpupzalylk 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl pukbjapvu vm huhlzaolzph.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvuayvs vm tbzjhypupj zpkl-lmmljaz vm ulvzapntpul pu ylclyzhs vm jvtwlapapcl ulbyvtbzjbshy isvjr
Lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph hzzvjphalk dpao ilah-isvjrly bzl
Iyhkfjhykph mvssvdpun tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (whyapjbshysf pm jvtwspjhalk if ofwvaluzpvu)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Hayvwpul ahislaz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun. Huf jspupjhs ilulmpa hz h nhzayv-pualzapuhs huapzwhztvkpj pz vbadlpnolk if hayvwpupj zpkl-lmmljaz.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu, zvsbapvu mvy pumbzpvu, lfl kyvwz, lfl vpuatlua.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><o4>Jvuayvs vm tbzjhypupj zpkl-lmmljaz vm ulvzapntpul pu ylclyzhs vm jvtwlapapcl ulbyvtbzjbshy isvjr</o4><w>Zpujl hayvwpul ohz h zovyaly kbyhapvu vm hjapvu aohu ulvzapntpul, shal buvwwvzlk iyhkfjhykph thf ylzbsa; jsvzl tvupavypun vm aol whaplua pz uljlzzhyf.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz thf uva il hisl av buklyahrl zrpsslk ahzrz buaps cpzpvu jslhyz hmaly tfkyphzpz.</w>
\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Huaptbzjhypupjz jhu hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl hayvwpul zbswohal lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; wovavwoviph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahjofjhykph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwlwzph; msbzopun; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahjofjhykph; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; jvumbzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzaluzpvu; huopkyvzpz; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; iyvujophs zljylapvu kljylhzlk; kfzwohnph; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlyaolytph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfkyphzpz; zwlljo kpzvykly; ahzal svzz; aopyza</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Wzfjovapj kpzvykly</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; ofwlyaluzpcl jypzpz; zlpgbyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Puzvtuph</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth; hyyofaotphz; iyvujophs zljylapvu hsalylk; jolza whpu; kfzwohnph; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; tfkyphzpz; zahnnlypun; aopyza</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</zayvun></w><w>Zfzaltpj zpkl-lmmljaz jhu vjjby.</w>\u\u\u

<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu mvy bclpapz.</w>    <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz mvy puayh-vwlyhapcl iyhkfjhykph vy if puayhcluvbz yvbal mvy wyltlkpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl if vyhs yvbal.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>AVEIHZL hkcpzlz hayvwpul zbsmhal pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk mvy aol aylhatlua vm zftwavthapj iyhkfjhykph kbl av hjbal vclykvzhnl vm ilah-isvjrlyz, iba aolzl thf chyf myvt aovzl spjluzlk.</w>
